title:
Cosmologies in $f(R,\mathcal{L}_m)$ theory with non-minimal coupling
  between geometry and matter
authors:
Sergio Bravo Medina and Marek Nowakowski and Ronaldo V. Lobato and
  Davide Batic
abstract:
Among the recent extensions to standard General Relativity,
$f(R,\mathcal{L}_m)$ gravity has risen an interest given the possibility of
coupling between geometry and matter. We examine the simplest model with
non-minimal coupling in the context of cosmology. We pay special attention to
the question of how far this model could reproduce the observational fact of
our universe.
